en-US.summary: Test your knowledge of the division
en-US.name: Fizz Buzz
en-US.description:
Test your knowledge of division.

Fizz Buzz provides a fun way to keep your divison skills sharp.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Fizz Buzz" or "Alexa, open Fizz Buzz" to start the game".

At anytime, you can stop the game by saying "Alexa, stop"
